languages.text: {n}Пораженный регион был изолирован. Вскоре один из беглых немочей вышел из чащи и передал встретившим его стражам сверток с ксеноартефактом, а также послание: "Примите дары и не трожьте мир".{/n}

{n}The afflicted region was isolated. Soon after the quarantine had been imposed, one of the escaped retches emerged from the jungle and handed the wardens who met him a parcel containing some kind of xeno-artefact and a message: "Accept the gifts and leave the world in peace."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пораженный регион был изолирован. Вскоре один из беглых немочей вышел из чащи и передал встретившим его стражам сверток с ксеноартефактом, а также послание: "Примите дары и не трожьте мир".{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The afflicted region had been isolated. Soon after one of the escaped wretches emerged from the jungle and handed the wardens who met him a parcel with some kind of a xeno artifact and a message: "Accept the gifts and leave the world in peace."{/n}

{n}The afflicted region was isolated. Soon after the quarantine had been imposed, one of the escaped retches emerged from the jungle and handed the wardens who met him a parcel containing some kind of xeno-artefact and a message: "Accept the gifts and leave the world in peace."{/n}

languages.text: {n}La región afectada quedó aislada. Poco después de la cuarentena, uno de los mutantes fugados salió de la jungla y entregó a los guardias un paquete con un xenoartefacto y un mensaje: «Aceptad los regalos y dejad este mundo en paz».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The afflicted region was isolated. Soon after the quarantine had been imposed, one of the escaped retches emerged from the jungle and handed the wardens who met him a parcel containing some kind of xeno-artefact and a message: "Accept the gifts and leave the world in peace."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La región afectada quedó aislada. Poco después de la cuarentena, uno de los mutantes fugados salió de la jungla y entregó a los guardias un paquete con un xenoartefacto y un mensaje: «Aceptad los regalos y dejad este mundo en paz».{/n}

languages.text: {n}La région affectée a été isolée. Peu de temps après la mise en quarantaine, un infâme s'est aventuré hors de la jungle ; aux gardiens venus à sa rencontre, il a tendu un paquet contenant une sorte de xéno-artefact, ainsi qu'un message : « Acceptez ces présents et quittez ce monde en paix. »{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The afflicted region was isolated. Soon after the quarantine had been imposed, one of the escaped retches emerged from the jungle and handed the wardens who met him a parcel containing some kind of xeno-artefact and a message: "Accept the gifts and leave the world in peace."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La région affectée a été isolée. Peu de temps après la mise en quarantaine, un infâme s'est aventuré hors de la jungle ; aux gardiens venus à sa rencontre, il a tendu un paquet contenant une sorte de xéno-artefact, ainsi qu'un message : « Acceptez ces présents et quittez ce monde en paix. »{/n}

languages.text: {n}受影响的地区进行了隔离。不久之后，一名丑恶种突破了封锁，从密林深处钻了出来，将一件装着异形造物的小包裹交给守卫，里面还带着一句话。“收下这些礼物，不要再打扰这个世界了。”{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The afflicted region was isolated. Soon after the quarantine had been imposed, one of the escaped retches emerged from the jungle and handed the wardens who met him a parcel containing some kind of xeno-artefact and a message: "Accept the gifts and leave the world in peace."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}受影响的地区进行了隔离。不久之后，一名丑恶种突破了封锁，从密林深处钻了出来，将一件装着异形造物的小包裹交给守卫，里面还带着一句话。“收下这些礼物，不要再打扰这个世界了。”{/n}
{n}受影响的地区遭到了隔离。不久之后，一名丑恶种突破了封锁，从密林深处钻了出来，将一件装着异形造物的小包裹交给守卫，里面还带着一句话。“收下这些礼物，不要再打扰这个世界了。”{/n}

languages.text: {n}被災地帯は隔離された。隔離後まもなく、脱走した異民がジャングルから姿を表し、監視員に何らかの異種族のアーティファクトとメッセージの入った小包を手渡した。メッセージには「贈り物を受け取り、静かにこの惑星を去れ」と記されていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The afflicted region was isolated. Soon after the quarantine had been imposed, one of the escaped retches emerged from the jungle and handed the wardens who met him a parcel containing some kind of xeno-artefact and a message: "Accept the gifts and leave the world in peace."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}被災地帯は隔離された。隔離後まもなく、脱走した惨めな人間がジャングルから姿を表し、監視員に何らかの異種族のアーティファクトとメッセージの入った小包を手渡した。メッセージには「贈り物を受け取り、静かにこの惑星を去れ」と記されていた。{/n}
{n}被災地帯は隔離された。隔離後まもなく、脱走した異民がジャングルから姿を表し、監視員に何らかの異種族のアーティファクトとメッセージの入った小包を手渡した。メッセージには「贈り物を受け取り、静かにこの惑星を去れ」と記されていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die betroffene Region wurde isoliert. Kurz nach der Verhängung der Quarantäne kam einer der geflohenen Speier aus dem Dschungel und übergab den Wächtern ein Parket mit einem Xeno-Artefakt und einer Botschaft: "Akzeptiert die Geschenke und lasst die Welt in Frieden."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The afflicted region was isolated. Soon after the quarantine had been imposed, one of the escaped retches emerged from the jungle and handed the wardens who met him a parcel containing some kind of xeno-artefact and a message: "Accept the gifts and leave the world in peace."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die betroffene Region wurde isoliert. Kurz nach der Verhängung der Quarantäne kam einer der geflohenen Speier aus dem Dschungel und übergab den Wächtern ein Parket mit einem Xeno-Artefakt und einer Botschaft: "Akzeptiert die Geschenke und lasst die Welt in Frieden."{/n}

{n}Die betroffene Region wurde isoliert. Bald nach der Quarantäne ist einer der entkommenen Speier aus dem Dschungel getreten und hat den Wächtern ein Paket mit einem Xeno-Artefakt und einer Botschaft überreicht: "Akzeptiert die Geschenke und lasst die Welt in Frieden."{/n}

languages.text: {n}Müteessir bölge izole edildi. Karantina uygulanıp hemen ardından kaçan leşlerden biri, yağmur ormanında ortaya çıktı ve kendisiyle karşılaşan dizdarlara bir tür zeno eseriyle birlikte bir paket uzatarak mesajını iletti: "Hediyeleri kabul edin ve bu dünyayı rahat bırakın."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The afflicted region was isolated. Soon after the quarantine had been imposed, one of the escaped retches emerged from the jungle and handed the wardens who met him a parcel containing some kind of xeno-artefact and a message: "Accept the gifts and leave the world in peace."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Müteessir bölge izole edildi. Karantina uygulanıp hemen ardından kaçan leşlerden biri, yağmur ormanında ortaya çıktı ve kendisiyle karşılaşan dizdarlara bir tür zeno eseriyle birlikte bir paket uzatarak mesajını iletti: "Hediyeleri kabul edin ve bu dünyayı rahat bırakın."{/n}
